job_description:
Senior Business Analyst

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead requirement workshops, client calls, and discovery discussions to understand business needs clearly.
  • Ask deeper questions, challenge assumptions, and validate the true business intent behind every requirement.
  • Convert ambiguous client inputs into structured, logical, and actionable functional understanding.
  • Break large features into modules, workflows, components, and clear dependencies.
  • Build strong system-level understanding involving APIs, integrations, data flow, and backend considerations.
  • Translate business processes into functional logic that development teams can execute.
  • Decompose requirements into use-case flows, system behaviours, edge cases, alternate paths, validation rules, and dependencies.
  • Prepare high-quality documentation, including BRD, FRD, SRS, workflows, state diagrams, data-flow diagrams, API requirement specs, and acceptance criteria.
  • Ensure all documentation is clear, logical, structured, testable, and ready for developers and QA to use.
  • Collaborate closely with developers, architects, QA, and product owners to validate feasibility and align understanding.
  • Ensure QA teams can derive test cases effectively from your functional logic and acceptance criteria.
  • Communicate confidently with clients, handle requirement discussions smoothly, and clarify misunderstandings immediately.
  • Push back politely on unclear or changing requirements and ensure final decisions are documented properly.
  • Maintain requirement traceability throughout the lifecycle and ensure zero ambiguity during handover to development.
  • Own the entire requirement lifecycle from discovery to development readiness with high accountability.
  • Drive clarity across teams by ensuring every requirement is complete, validated, and logically consistent.

Requirements

  • Minimum 4+ years of core Business Analyst experience with strong analytical and system-level thinking.
  • Ability to break down complex requirements into clear components, workflows, and functional logic.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication with confidence in client interactions and clarifications.
  • Proven experience in preparing SRS, BRD, FRD, workflows, and acceptance criteria with high clarity.
  • Ability to challenge assumptions politely, ask the right questions, and ensure zero ambiguity.
  • Strong collaboration experience with development, QA, architects, and cross-functional teams.
  • Understanding of API behaviours, integrations, data flows, and multi-module system interactions.
  • Ability to run requirement discussions, workshops, and independently lead discovery sessions.
  • Exposure to SaaS, scalable products, automation, or AI-supported systems is an added advantage.
  • Demonstrated ownership of requirements end-to-end, ensuring developer-ready and testable outputs.
  • Not suitable for UI-only thinkers, passive communicators, template-based writers, or those relying on AI for answers.
  • Success is defined by clear, testable requirements, zero rework, strong cross-team alignment, and confident communication.
  • Candidates must align with 2Base’s structured thinking, clarity-driven culture, and transformation of the BA function.

Minimum Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or related field
  • 4 to 8 years of experience as a Business Analyst or Product Analyst
  • Experience in SaaS or scalable product environments
  • Exposure to AI/Automation, integrations, or multi-module systems
  • Ability to run independent client workshops
  • Must have independently handled requirement ownership for at least one full project lifecycle

Benefits

  • A growth-driven environment with opportunities to lead, innovate, and upskill continuously.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@2basetechnologies.com
summary: Senior Business Analyst translates business needs into functional requirements, ensuring clarity and collaboration. Requires 4+ years, strong analytical skills, and SaaS/AI experience.

job_description:
Senior DevSecOps Engineer

We are seeking a Senior DevSecOps Engineer to lead our cybersecurity, infrastructure automation, and DevSecOps practices as we transition to a secure, scalable, and modern engineering environment. This role will strengthen 2Base’s security posture, modernize pipelines, and foster a secure-by-design culture. You will collaborate with engineering, product, and leadership teams to ensure systems, applications, and cloud environments are secure, reliable, and future-ready.

Key Responsibilities

  • Define, implement, and enforce security standards, policies, and best practices across cloud and on-prem environments.
  • Conduct security risk assessments, vulnerability scans, penetration testing, and mitigation plans.
  • Architect and enhance secure CI/CD pipelines with automated compliance and governance checkpoints.
  • Promote a "Security First" culture, ensuring secure design and development practices.
  • Monitor, detect, investigate, and respond to security threats, incidents, breaches, and anomalies.
  • Develop Infrastructure-as-Code practices using Terraform, Ansible, and automation frameworks.
  • Design secure cloud architectures across AWS, Azure, or GCP for scalable, compliant deployments.
  • Build and secure containerized environments with Docker and Kubernetes, enforcing security baselines.
  • Implement secure monitoring, logging, SIEM, and alerting systems for infrastructure and applications.
  • Improve system reliability, scalability, performance, and fault tolerance for critical workloads.
  • Mentor DevOps engineers in secure development, automation, and operational excellence.
  • Lead technical strategy, tool selection, process improvements, and DevSecOps roadmap execution.
  • Collaborate with BA, PM, and Engineering teams to align security, performance, and delivery goals.

Required Skills & Experience

  • 4–8 years of experience in DevOps, Cloud, or Infrastructure engineering with strong security exposure.
  • Hands-on experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions).
  • Expertise in AWS, Azure, or GCP cloud platforms with secure architecture focus.
  • Proficiency in Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform, Ansible).
  • Experience securing Docker and Kubernetes environments.
  • Strong understanding of networking technologies (LAN/WAN, firewalls, VPN, load balancers).
  • Knowledge of security frameworks (OWASP, NIST, CIS Benchmarks).
  • Experience with monitoring/logging tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, CloudWatch, SIEM).
  • Strong scripting skills (Python, Bash, Shell).
  • Excellent troubleshooting, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills to influence engineering teams.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Diploma/Degree/B.Tech in IT, CS, MCA.
  • Experience in SOC operations or SIEM/SOAR tools.
  • Certifications: AWS Security/DevOps Engineer – Professional, CKS, CEH, CompTIA Security+.

Benefits

  • A growth-driven environment with opportunities to lead, innovate, and upskill continuously.

Contact: Share your resume at careers@2basetechnologies.com.
summary: Lead DevSecOps practices to strengthen security, modernize pipelines, and ensure secure cloud infrastructure. Requires 4-8 years of experience in secure DevOps and cloud platforms.

job_description:

We are seeking an experienced QA Lead to oversee the entire quality assurance lifecycle, manage a team of QA engineers, and ensure the delivery of high-quality software products. The ideal candidate should have strong expertise in manual and automation testing, test strategy planning, quality processes, and team leadership.

Key Responsibilities - Lead and mentor the QA team by providing guidance, technical expertise, and domain knowledge to ensure timely completion of testing activities. - Review business requirements, functional specifications, and design documents to ensure complete test coverage across all features. - Prepare and maintain comprehensive QA documentation, including test plans, test cases, user flow diagrams, and coverage reports. - Plan and execute regression testing for each release, delegate tasks to junior QA members, and collaborate closely with the development team to ensure high-quality, on-time delivery. - Perform functional testing, database validation, and log analysis to ensure stability and reliability of the web application (Spring MVC) and Spring Boot–based API services. - Manage test environments, test data, and automation scripts; evaluate and recommend suitable automation frameworks, tools, and technologies to enhance testing efficiency. - Ensure adherence to QA processes, best practices, and documentation standards aligned with the SDLC. - Coordinate with cross-functional teams including development, project management, business teams, and clients to resolve issues and support smooth release cycles. - Identify root causes of recurring issues, implement corrective actions, and continuously monitor the application to prevent recurring defects. - Explore and propose new automation tools, ideas, and methodologies to improve testing efficiency and coverage.

Requirements - Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. - 5–7 years of experience in QA with minimum 2+ years in a lead or leadership role. - Strong knowledge of manual and automation testing methodologies. - Hands-on experience with API testing tools and performance testing tools. - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with exceptional attention to detail. - Excellent leadership, communication, and stakeholder management skills. - ISTQB or similar certification is an added advantage.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@empaysoft.com.
summary: Lead QA team to ensure high-quality software delivery through manual and automation testing, test strategy, and cross-functional collaboration.

Job Title: Computer Vision/ML Engineer (Computer Vision)

Brief Description

We are seeking a highly skilled Computer Vision/ML Engineer to design, develop, and deploy scalable machine learning and deep learning solutions for real-world, production-grade systems. The ideal candidate will work on end-to-end Computer Vision pipelines spanning model development, optimization, deployment on edge/IoT platforms, and integration with enterprise applications. This role demands strong expertise in computer vision, deep learning frameworks, and production system design, along with the ability to collaborate effectively across multidisciplinary teams.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain reusable, testable, and efficient production-grade ML/DL code for computer vision pipelines.
  • Build and optimize low-latency, high-availability, and high-performance Computer Vision applications, including real-time and near-real-time systems.
  • Design, train, fine-tune, and evaluate computer vision models for detection, recognition, classification, and analytics use cases.
  • Assess, prioritize, and implement feature requests based on business, product, and technical requirements.
  • Collaborate with product, front-end, backend, firmware, and DevOps teams to understand user requirements and deliver robust technical solutions.
  • Integrate Computer Vision models with server-side logic, APIs, and user-facing components.
  • Design and integrate data storage solutions, including relational databases, NoSQL/key-value stores, object/blob storage, and feature stores.
  • Deploy and optimize models on GPU and edge Computer Vision/IoT platforms, ensuring performance, reliability, and scalability.
  • Consume HTTP REST and streaming APIs for inference and system integration.
  • Ensure adherence to software engineering best practices including version control, testing, documentation, CI/CD pipelines, and OWASP/CERT/MISRA guidelines for secure software development.

Required Skills & Qualifications

Technical Skills: - Strong programming expertise in Python and/or C++, with hands-on experience in PyTorch 2.x, Jax, or both. - Demonstrable experience in Image Processing and Computer Vision, with a solid understanding of modern CNN/Transformer-based deep learning architectures, Object Detectors, Segmentation models, Object Tracking, and related paradigms. - Ability to train and optimize computer vision models on single and multi-GPU systems. - Experience with GPU acceleration technologies; knowledge of CUDA and OpenCL is a strong plus. - Experience in mobile Computer Vision deployment is an advantage, including Java/Kotlin, TensorFlow Lite, CoreML. - Proficiency with the Linux command line (bash/zsh/fish shells mandatory), as most development and deployment involve remotely connected edge Computer Vision/IoT devices or cloud instances. - Working knowledge of HTTP REST and Websocket streaming APIs, RTSP, and other real-time video/audio data streaming protocols. - Solid understanding of scalable system design principles, including performance optimization and fault tolerance. - Familiarity with event-driven architectures and asynchronous processing in the context of Python/Rust/C++ (e.g., Python asyncio, Rust async/tokio, Boost Async/libuv/C++ std::async (>= 17)). - Understanding of platform-specific constraints and optimizations across mobile, desktop, edge, and server environments.

Educational Qualifications & Experience: - B.Tech/B.E. + 4+ years of relevant industry experience; M.Tech/M.E. + 2.5+ years of relevant industry experience. Experience outside CV/ML/AI will not be considered.

Preferred Attributes: - Experience with edge Computer Vision, embedded systems, or IoT-based deployments. - Exposure to real-world production systems beyond research or prototyping. - Strong problem-solving skills and a structured approach to debugging and optimization. - Ability to work independently as well as in cross-functional teams. - Passion for building impactful Computer Vision solutions at scale.
summary: A Computer Vision/ML Engineer is needed to develop scalable ML/DL solutions for production systems, integrating with enterprise applications and optimizing models for edge/IoT platforms.

We are seeking a highly motivated Junior DevOps Engineer to join our team in Trivandrum. The primary focus of this role is the management and orchestration of Kubernetes and Docker environments. Beyond standard deployments, you will incorporate Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) principles to ensure our systems are highly available and performant. Core DevOps & Cloud - Deploy, manage, and scale containerized applications using Kubernetes and Docker. - Manage and maintain resources primarily on Azure (preferred) or AWS. - Write robust Bash and Python scripts to automate infrastructure tasks and system configurations. - Configure and optimize Apache web servers and support automated CI/CD pipelines. - Troubleshoot and manage cloud networking components (DNS, Load Balancers, VNETs/VPCs).

Shift Requirements
